text:
Zendaya has been in a lot of TV shows, music videos, and movies over the years and she's worn a lot of impressive looks.

In Bruno Mars' "Versace on the Floor," Zendaya stuns in sparkles.

Zendaya's outfit is simple for her act in "The Greatest Showman."

On HBO's "Euphoria," her character Rue wears outfits that are trendy and androgynous.

Actress and singer Zendaya has been making a name for herself on the red carpet, but she also slays on screen.

From her roles in music videos to her on-screen appearances on Disney Channel and HBO, Zendaya has been able to rock some impressive costumes. Continue on for some of the star's best on-screen looks.
title: 11 of Zendaya's best on-screen looks of all time
